title: Kristallnacht - Blooddrenched memorial 1994-2002 (Cult NSBM)
description:
Kristallnacht - Blooddrenched memorial 1994-2002

2. Coronation in pure blasphemy
3. Night & Fog

5. For resurrection of our movement
6. Aryan blood
